CustomField.description: Only add Sales Agreement Products to Sales Agreements when the Quote Line's SA Key matches the Sales Agreement's SA Key. Can be used with the Match QLI Account to SA Account setting.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Only add Sales Agreement Products to Sales Agreements when the Quote Line's SA Key matches the Sales Agreement's SA Key. Can be used with the Match QLI Account to SA Account setting.
CustomField.label: Match QLI Key to SA Key
